course.subject: MECH
course.name: Engineering Ethics and Social Values
course.description: Within the context of the diminishing role of the state and of globalization, study of ethical issues in engineering practices and operation such as: the social responsibility of technological firms, the rights and obligations of employees and employers in engineering enterprises, the problem of discrimination, environmental issues, the impact of technological advances and implications on society. Course structure: Corporate Governance and Accountability in Engineering Enterprises, Engineering Business Ethics, Social Impact, Stakeholders and Key Communities, Measurement tools.
